t: Chapter 7B. Collection and Disposal of Refuse Authorized

c.t: § 8–741. Collection and disposal of refuse authorized as municipal function; purchase or lease of facilities; sale of products; gratuities prohibited; authorization to enter into mutual aid agreements for debris removal.
